# serverNonceClaimName

**Instance Property**

The name of the claim to include in authentication requests.

## Declaration

```swift
var serverNonceClaimName: String { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is `request_nonce`.

## Configuring the server nonce

- **customNonceRequestValues**: Custom values to add to the server nonce POST request body.
- **nonceEndpointURL**: The URL to retrieve a one-time use value from the server.
- **nonceResponseKeypath**: The keypath in the response that contains the one-time use value.
